columns.name: replication_task_identifier
columns.description: The user-assigned replication task identifier or name.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication task.

columns.name: cdc_start_position
columns.description: Indicates when you want a change data capture (CDC) operation to start.

columns.name: cdc_stop_position
columns.description: Indicates when you want a change data capture (CDC) operation to stop.

columns.name: last_failure_message
columns.description: The last error (failure) message generated for the replication task.

columns.name: migration_type
columns.description: The type of migration.

columns.name: recovery_checkpoint
columns.description: Indicates the last checkpoint that occurred during a change data capture (CDC) operation.

columns.name: replication_instance_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication instance.

columns.name: replication_task_creation_date
columns.description: The date the replication task was created.

columns.name: replication_task_start_date
columns.description: The date the replication task is scheduled to start.

columns.name: source_endpoint_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the endpoint.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of the replication task.

columns.name: stop_reason
columns.description: The reason the replication task was stopped.

columns.name: table_mappings
columns.description: Table mappings specified in the task.

columns.name: target_endpoint_arn
columns.description: The ARN that uniquely identifies the endpoint.

columns.name: target_replication_instance_arn
columns.description: The ARN of the replication instance to which this task is moved in response to running the MoveReplicationTask operation.

columns.name: task_data
columns.description: Supplemental information that the task requires to migrate the data for certain source and target endpoints.

columns.name: replication_task_settings
columns.description: The settings for the replication task.

columns.name: replication_task_stats
columns.description: The statistics for the task, including elapsed time, tables loaded, and table errors.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags currently associated with the replication instance.
